error_msg: The parameters for PartialDependence should be one of ['percentiles', 'grid_resolution'].
description: PartialDependence of a feature shows the average prediction of a machine learning model for each possible value of the feature.

oneOf.error_msg: A whole number greater than or equal to 1 must be entered.
oneOf.description: The number of equidistant points to split the range of the target feature
